product_name: Riderz Sip 'N Ride Water Bottle - 12 Fl. Oz. - Girls'
long_description: The Riderz Sip 'N Ride Water Bottle for girls keeps your little biker happy and hydrated on family rides. It features a clip you can attach to her handlebars, stem or seatpost.
short_description: The Riderz Sip 'N Ride Water Bottle for girls keeps your little biker happy and hydrated on family rides. It features a clip you can attach to her handlebars, stem or seatpost.
